data.message: i have no idea if you actually read your comments and u dont know me from a whole in a ground but youru song soldior (i cant spell lol sorry) but thats realating to my life right now exactly and ni matter what i do do make a better change in ,y life its one thing after another and i am going through a custody battle and on top of everything and every thing on top of everything and that song made it all  hit hard i was just wondering how the fuck you stayed strong i know bab is the buggest motivation but when you have "the weight of the world on your shoulders" it gets extremly hard how the hell did you do it im at my wits end
